Name: Error
Description: Violations appear as build errors and cause builds to fail.

Name: Warning
Description: Violations appear as build warnings but do not cause builds to fail (unless you have an option set to treat warnings as errors).

Name: Info
Description: Violations appear as build messages and as suggestions in the Visual Studio IDE.

Name: Disabled
Description: Violations aren't visible to the user.

Name: Default
Description: The default severity of the rule is used.
